Text:
The Seven Shadows have decided to throw a thank-you
party to show their gratitude to Shadow.

And the party organizer, Gamma, is facing
a serious internal dilemma.
Whew...

I still clearly remember the day when I met my lord
and his soothing bluish-purple magic.

And not only that, I also remember every single
word my lord said.

When I think of what my lord has given me since we
met and until now...
Hmm...
Just having a party for him isn't enough!

I'll definitely throw a party, but is there anything
else I can do for him...?

In addition to the party, I should offer the utmost
hospitality, shouldn't I?
But what else can I do for now...?
Hmm...let me think...
Perhaps a gift, or....?

No, be serious, Gamma. My lord would never be
satisfied with the type of things I think of...

I must think of something that I'd normally never
imagine... I'm really stumped...! I'm going to go
mad trying to come up with something!

Oh...! Could this be Shadow Wisdom? Am I
finally tapping into my own type of wisdom?!

...Stop saying such absurd things!
I need to take this seriously.

My lord would like jewelry, gold nuggets, precious
metals, and antiques... But simply giving him an
expensive item won't cut it.

For example, not something so overtly materialistic,
but something that has true historical value might
do the trick.

Ancient artifacts? Ancient structures, or perhaps
legendary weapons rich in history...!
He might like something with a dark, cursed history!

...But if I did find something like that, it should
be researched immediately, not be given away!
Ah...the more I worry about it, the worse it gets...
Y-Yes, more importantly—

We could take over everything in the surrounding
area—land, buildings, and people. He would have
vast resources at his disposal!

With the Garden's power and by taking over the nobles
and the Cult of Diablos, we'll rule the world!
Heh...heh heh...heh heh heh! Yes! That's exactly it!
Ah...
...I...think I might be overdoing it...

*sigh* With her clever mind, I bet Lady Alpha could
solve this problem. I'm sure in a pickle...

I always resort to sending extravagant gifts using my
earnings from Mitsugoshi, such as when I presented
my lord with the Hall of Shadows.

It's very much my style, but since Mitsugoshi is an
important source of funding for the Garden, I can't
use our earnings recklessly.

Even if I buy something pricey for my lord, I'm only
fulfilling my own desires instead of making him happy.

Even if I am in a position to spend our earnings as
I see fit...I need to be responsible.
Hmm...

This party is supposed to be a way for the Seven
Shadows to show their gratitude to our lord and
celebrate his success.

I got everyone involved in this plan, so I must
prioritize making it a success.

I also can't get ahead of the others, or they will
surely be upset with me. It is important to keep
pace with them.

I started this whole thing in the first place, and I
need to ensure it gets done right. I can't just think
about myself.

This time, it's my turn to take the lead! If anything,
I should be the one to step up and help if someone
is struggling with the budget!
All right! With all that settled...
I'll give it my all!
Huh? Aaaaghhh!
*smash!* *bam!* *crash!* *groan...*

Even though there was nothing to trip on, Gamma
fell down the stairs at an incredible speed.
I-I'll...give it all I got...! *splat!*
